item.title: How to set up Istio with GetMesh on GKE
item.description: GetMesh is a CLI for Istio distributions open sourced by Tetrate. It mainly solves the following problems of Istio. Istio lifecycle management Tested and safe Istio configurations Native integrations into the computing environment Learning curve and ongoing support To learn more about GetMesh, please visit https://istio.tetratelabs.io This article will start by taking you through a hands-on installation and use of GetMesh on GKE, including: Installing Istio 1.7 on GKE Adding a virtual machine to the mesh Deploying the Bookinfo example Integrating a virtual machine for testing Upgrading Istio to 1.
